titleStmt.title: The generall historie of Spaine containing all the memorable things that haue past in the realmes of Castille, Leon, Nauarre, Arragon, Portugall, Granado, &c. and by what meanes they were vnited, and so continue vnder Philip the third, King of Spaine, now raigning; written in French by Levvis de Mayerne Turquet, vnto the yeare 1583: translated into English, and continued vnto these times by Edvvard Grimeston, Esquire.
Histoire generale d'Espagne. English
titleStmt.author: Mayerne, Louis Turquet de, d. 1618.
Grimeston, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Islip, and G. Eld,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Histoire generale d'Espagne.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
